body:
hey guys i thought of making a forum game
Hopefully it works out well :D

What would you do with 3 wishes

Rules:
1) do not wish for more wishes
2) do not wish for love </3
3) do not wish to bring people back to life

i start off
1. i wish i could find true happiness
2. i wish i could afford anything at anytime
3. i wish i could live at any age whenever i want

title: {Forum Game} Wishes
